title: Definitive chocolate cake
description: Chocolate cake meets Victoria sponge in this easy-to-make recipe filled with cream and jam. It's a great treat for a birthday, Mother's Day or Easter. Equipment and preparation: You will need two loose-bottomed 20cm/8in sandwich tins, 4cm/1½in deep.
ingredients: 225g/8oz unsalted butter, softened, plus extra for greasing
225g/8oz caster sugar, plus extra for sprinkling
